content.query:
--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_clientNeoBank
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.clientNeoBank
(RowNumber 1, CustomerId 2, Surname 3, CreditScore 4, Geography 5, Gender 6, Age 7, Tenure 8, Balance 9, NumOfProducts 10, HasCrCard 11, IsActiveMember 12, EstimatedSalary 13, Exited 14)
FROM 'https://saneobankpocunit.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/NeoBank_Modelling/neobankclients_databricks.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://saneobankpocunit.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/NeoBank_Modelling/'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.clientNeoBank
GO
